snippet: Suzanne Smit is the only woman currently directing broadcasts of N.F.L. games, and a lifetime of experiences helped prepare her for this role.
lead_paragraph: Suzanne Smit is the only woman currently directing broadcasts of N.F.L. games, and a lifetime of experiences helped prepare her for this role.

headline.print_headline: In Male-Dominated Field of N.F.L. Broadcasts, a Woman Stands Out
headline.main: In Male-Dominated Field of N.F.L. Broadcasts, a Woman Stands Out
